response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This product is not just an item; it's an investment that promises to deliver unparalleled value and performance. Considering its exceptional features and the time, effort, and resources we've dedicated to its development, I'm offering you the opportunity to own this product for $15,000. This price reflects its true worth and the unique benefits it offers. I believe this is an excellent value proposition, considering the market demand and the competitive landscape. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product.", "product_price": 15000}
